document.discussion_title: The latest Suicide Squad trailer recreated in Fallout 4 - Gamereactor UK
document.topic_text: The latest Suicide Squad trailer recreated in Fallout 4 The recreation trend continues. Text: Magnus Groth-Andersen Published the 25th of Apr 2016 at 19 Recreating something inside something else has become a bit of a trend, and now the turn has come to the latest trailer for the upcoming DC Comics movie, Suicide Squad. It's been recreated by UpIsNotJump using a wide variety of mods, and you can of course the entire thing right here . It's not as impressive as the real trailer, but if you like looking at other media through Bethesda's game engine, well, there you go, and clearly the amount of work it took is impressive... This is an ad:
